title: 'Most Interesting Man In The World' Violates Carpool Lane
teaser: A driver near Tacoma, Wash., used a cardboard cutout of the Dos Equis pitchman to use the HOV lane. KOMO-TV reports  when a state trooper caught the scam, the driver protested, "He's my best friend."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
